string: ALTER TABLE `certificate_datas` CHANGE `recertification_in_year` `recertification_in_year` INT(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0';
ALTER TABLE `certificate_datas` CHANGE `renewal_in_year` `renewal_in_year` INT(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0';
ALTER TABLE certificate_datas ADD certified_differentiation tinyint(4) default null;
ALTER TABLE certificate_datas add expiration_date date null default null;
